entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is an elf who has been set free by Harry Potter. He is described as having 'orb-like eyes' and an 'ugly brown face'. (Excerpt: 'Harry Potter freed Dobby!')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one who set Dobby free. He is described as grinning and having a conversation with Dobby. (Excerpts: 'Least I could do, Dobby', 'You told me all this had nothing to do with He Who Must Not Be Named')

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a character who has no choice but to leave. He is described as having an 'incensed stare' at Harry and Dobby. (Excerpt: 'With a last, incensed stare at the pair of them')

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: He Who Must Not Be Named is a concept that is mentioned as being related to Dobby's clue. (Excerpt: 'You told me all this had nothing to do with He Who Must Not Be Named')

relationships.description: Harry Potter set Dobby free. (Excerpt: 'Harry Potter freed Dobby!')

relationships.entity_2: he who must not be named
relationships.description: Dobby's clue is related to He Who Must Not Be Named. (Excerpt: 'The Dark Lord, before he changed his name, could be freely named')
